posts.title: New worst offender
posts.subtitle: Plane caught flying illegally for over 1 and a half hours
copy: In a recent site update we crowned our first worst offender, tail number N256SF is a Cessna 172S that to date has been caught flying below 500ft in superior airspace for almost 1 hour and 45 minutes
View our worst offenders page to see more about this planes impact.
